Agargaon, Sherebangla Nagar, Dhaka-1207
NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)
Controller of Examinations
Bangladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka - 1207

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022Page 54 of 1237Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)
Controller of Examinations

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  Page 155 of 1237                           ( M A S Kawsar Sarker)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  Page 256 of 1237                           ( M A S Kawsar Sarker)

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  Page 268 of 1237                           ( M A S Kawsar Sarker)

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the

reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
                           ( M A S Kawsar Sarker)
                       Deputy Controller of Examination
                Bngladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022Page 323 of 1237Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

25It is to be notified all concerned that roll numbers who have passed in all subjects in the 1st Semester (2022 Regulation) Examination of DIPLOMA IN  ENGINEERING, 2021 held in
Aug-Sep, 2022 are listed below in accordance with the notification no. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283  dated 05-12-2022 in regulation of the board.
It is to be notified all concerned that roll numbers who have failed in three or less subjects in the 1st Semester (2022 Regulation) Examination of DIPLOMA IN  ENGINEERING, 2021
held in Aug-Sep, 2022 are listed below in accordance with the notification no. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283  dated 05-12-2022 in regulation of the board. The subjects in which the
student has referred in any semester are listed beside the respective roll numbers.

held in Aug-Sep, 2022 are listed below in accordance with the notification no. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283  dated 05-12-2022 in regulation of the board. The subjects in which the

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

26711(T,P), 28511(P) }Page 487 of 1237Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)
Controller of Examinations
Bangladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka - 1207

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  Page 813 of 1237                           ( M A S Kawsar Sarker)

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
 (Md. Kapayet Ullah)
Controller of Examinations

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.001.22.283 Date : 05-12-2022
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 December, 2022. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 December, 2022, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.

1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
